name: Jokers Masquerade
overview:
Jokers’ Masquerade prides itself in offering for sale quality fancy dress costumes direct from our 40,000 square foot of office and warehouse complexes where we hold 10,000’s of products in stock for immediate shipping. Unlike many competitors, our website is configured only to allow acceptance of your order when the required product is in stock. Already you can be assured that you are buying with confidence and will not be let down.

However and with the adoption of price comparison shopping portals such as Kelkoo and PriceRunner promoting ‘compare, buy, save’ philosophies, we are aware that some shoppers may indeed price compare products at competitor websites. Be aware of free postage offers that entice shoppers to buy then either disclaim with lengthened delivery timescales (allowing time to procure your order via supply chains) or increase the product price to disguise postage costs. Conversely, other websites offering ‘bargain’ and ‘cheap’ prices typically do not hold stock either and again procure from supply chains, leading to similar lengthended delivery times and sometimes ultimately dissapointment when goods do not arrive in time. A simple thought. Should you ever have to ‘telephone for next day delivery’ if the item is in stock?

At Jokers’ Masquerade we believe in honesty. We believe our product prices are fair and reflect the quality of the product. We have the largest UK online portfolio of products from which you can choose. We believe in an ethos that as an online retailer, like a High Street shop, the product must be in stock for you to buy. Would you walk into a High Street shop if there were no products on the shelves?
